cards.title: Goblin
cards.description: Small, sneaky, and quick. Loves to ambush unsuspecting adventurers.
cards.quote: Sly as a fox, quick as a shadow.

cards.title: Skeleton Warrior
cards.description: A reanimated skeleton wielding a rusty sword.

cards.title: Orc Brute
cards.description: A strong and fierce warrior with a brutal club.

cards.title: Dark Elf Archer
cards.description: Skilled in archery and dark magic, attacks from a distance.

cards.title: Stone Golem
cards.description: A massive construct made of stone, very hard to damage.

cards.title: Fire Elemental
cards.description: A being of living flame, burns everything in its path.
cards.quote: Feel the heat of my wrath!

cards.title: Vampire Lord
cards.description: A powerful vampire with a thirst for blood and dark powers.

cards.title: Dragon Hatchling
cards.description: A young dragon, already formidable with its fiery breath.
